snippet.title: Rustil: Eternal Labyrinth Castle Gameplay Trailer by Shinden Games  / 蒐命のラスティル - とこしえの迷宮城 PV 神電ゲームズ
snippet.description:
In a randomly changing labyrinth castle, Rustil aims for the top floor. An exhilarating roguelike action game in which players aim to reach the top floor while efficiently strengthening the main character by acquiring abilities from the souls of heroes.
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2162820/Rustil_Eternal_Labyrinth_Castle/
https://www.youtube.com/@user-ef2ht5lt6h
https://twitter.com/ys_game_jp

#rustil #JRPG #Action #Roguelike #monstertaming
